content.rendered:
[vc_row content_placement=”middle”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1466″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Avatouch, headquartered in Japan, is driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation and technology. Their vision has always revolved around creating a cutting-edge SaaS product designed to revolutionize the way online meetings and conversations are conducted.

With a strong focus on global markets, Avatouch is committed to providing a game-changing solution that transcends borders.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”dft-spacer”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Challenges faced by the Client

  • The challenge involved creating a SaaS product capable of swiftly recording videos and screens using a browser-based lightweight tool.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Solutions provided by Dreams Technologies

  • Dreams Technologies has developed a product that seamlessly captures images and records screens. Users have the capability to capture activities in video format and easily share them with others.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”dft-spacer greybg”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Technologies Used

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJzZWN0aW9uLWhlYWRlci1pbmZvJTIwdGV4dC1jZW50ZXIlMjIlM0UlMEElMjAlMjAlMjAlMjAlM0NoMiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTIybWItMCUyMiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDc3BhbiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDJTJGc3BhbiUzRSUzQyUyRmgyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_basic_grid post_type=”casestudies” max_items=”3″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1744028701180-cc2472fc-c017-4″ el_class=”rec-blg-posts all-case-studies”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
